alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 13 at 1:05AM HST until December 13 at 4:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: The National Weather Service in Honolulu has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The island of Kauai in Kauai County * Until 400 AM HST. * At 105 AM HST, the Hanalei River stream gage reported a rapid rise in water level, and has reached a threshold that could result in the closure of Kuhio Highway near the Hanalei River Bridge. Flooding is expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain. SOURCE...Stream Gauges. IMPACT...Flooding in drainages, streams, rivers, roads, properties, and other low-lying areas. Public road closures possible in some areas. Landslides are possible in steep terrain. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Princeville, Kilauea, Hanalei, Wainiha, Haena, Alakai Swamp Trails, Na Pali State Park, Moloaa, Kokee State Park, Anahola and Kalihiwai. This warning may need to be extended beyond 400 AM HST if flooding persists. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, rivers, drainage ditches, and culverts, even if they are currently dry.
